signals: I coach founders around the world

pains: Being the bottleneck in the team
Desire for growth without sacrificing sanity

facts.text: Elevated Entrepreneur helps creative and consulting founders.
facts.evidence: Elevated Entrepreneur helps creative and consulting founders simplify their offers, scale without chaos, and step into their role as Part-Time CEO.

facts.text: The brand aims to help founders scale without chaos.
facts.evidence: Elevated Entrepreneur helps creative and consulting founders simplify their offers, scale without chaos, and step into their role as Part-Time CEO.

facts.text: Dhiren Bhatia is the Founder and CEO.
The brand offers a program called 'The Council'.
The brand has over 250 happy clients.
The brand's target audience includes service-based founders, consultants, coaches, agency owners, and creatives.
facts.evidence: If you’re a service-based founder, consultant, coach, agency owner, creative… these may sound familiar:

facts.text: The brand addresses the pain of being overwhelmed by delivery.
facts.evidence: You’re great at what you do, but overwhelmed by delivery

facts.text: The brand addresses the pain of being the bottleneck in the team.
facts.evidence: You have a team, but you’re still the bottleneck.

facts.text: The brand provides clarity for business owners.
facts.evidence: I realized most founders weren’t struggling with effort. They were struggling with clarity.

facts.text: The brand helps business owners stop being operators and start becoming leaders.
facts.evidence: So I built Elevated Entrepreneur to help business owners stop being operators… and start becoming leaders.

facts.text: Dhiren Bhatia has 16 years of experience in tech leadership.
facts.evidence: After 16 years in tech leadership and multiple business ventures

facts.text: The brand helps founders escape the trap of delivery.
facts.evidence: I coach founders around the world, helping them build businesses that scale without constant oversight, escape the trap of delivery

facts.text: The brand uses systems, strategy, and self-leadership to help founders.
facts.evidence: rebuild the business they were meant to lead using systems, strategy, and self-leadership

facts.text: The brand offers a diagnostic called 'The A Player System'.
facts.evidence: Here's one: The A Player System. This diagnostic reveals which strategic hire will create the most leverage in your business right now.
